summary: It is the year 2052, on Earth, in Spain, and the final days of almost everything. The city is a string of abandoned construction sites. Everyday there are fewer people and not all of them ... See full summary »
cast: Manolo Marín|Moisés Richart|Marta Bassols|Coque Sánchez|Margot Sánchez|Óscar de la Huerga|César Velasco|Begoña Alarcón|Eva Swoboda|Begoña Jiménez Velasco|Pilar López Cepeda|Harold Delgado|Ahmed Rizwan|Herminia Ruiz|Antonia del Río|Tania Atanasova|Gabriel José Risquez|Paula Parra|Demi Grigaliunaite|Vanesa Gómez|Nuria Cervello|Abilio Herrera|Joaquín Martínez
title: Sueñan los androides
